data.comment: The match is underway in Sittard-Geleen.
Goal! Sittard have got their heads in front thanks to a Zian Flemming strike.
In the minute 12, Zian Flemming (Sittard) has received a first yellow card.
Feyenoord are down to 10 men after Orkun Kokcu has been shown a red card.
Goal! Marcos Senesi levels the match at 1-1.
In the minute 43, Mats Seuntjens is booked for the home team.
An attacking Feyenoord player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 45, Dennis Higler blows to end the first-half.
Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead thanks to a penalty from Steven Berghuis.
The second-half is underway in Sittard-Geleen.
Sjors Ultee is making the team's first substitution at Fortuna Sittard Stadion with Lisandro Semedo replacing Emil Hansson.
In the minute 72, It seems as if Lisandro Semedo is unable to continue. Samuel Moutoussamy replaces him for the home team.
Dick Advocaat (Feyenoord) is making a first substitution, with Joao Carlos Teixeira replacing Nicolai Jorgensen.
Sittard make their third substitution with Djibril Dianessy replacing Tesfaldet Tekie.
In the minute 89, An attacking Feyenoord player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-3.
George Johnston is replacing Bryan Linssen for Feyenoord at Fortuna Sittard Stadion.
Steven Berghuis gives Feyenoord a 1-3 lead from the penalty spot.
